description: Adds the specified targets to the specified rule, or updates the targets if they are already associated with the rule.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The attacker could add targets that archive data, preparing it for exfiltration when a rule is triggered.
The attacker could configure targets to delete logs or other indicators of compromise upon execution, aiding in defense evasion
An attacker could set a target that exploits vulnerabilities in client applications, leading to remote execution when the rule is triggered.

incidents.description: Cloud Security Stories: From Risky Permissions to Ransomware Execution

securityImplications: Attackers might use PutTargets in AWS EventBridge to trigger a malicious Lambda function periodically.
